title: Efficient Regulatory Compliance
description: In 2020, senior management in Tunisia spent only 0.1% of their time dealing with government regulations, indicating a highly efficient regulatory environment.

title: High Investment in Secondary Education
description: In 2015, Tunisia allocated 52.4% of its GDP per capita to government expenditure per secondary student, reflecting a strong commitment to education.

title: Prioritization of Secondary Education
description: In 2015, 71.6% of Tunisia's government expenditure on education was dedicated to secondary education, showcasing a focus on this educational stage.

title: High Access to ARI Treatment for Children
description: In 2018, 97.5% of children under 5 in Tunisia were taken to a health provider for ARI treatment, highlighting excellent healthcare access for young children.

title: Rising Prevalence of Overweight in Young Boys
description: In 2018, 18% of boys under 5 in Tunisia were classified as overweight, indicating a growing concern for childhood obesity.
